interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: MARLOWE. Essentials Kit for Men No. 202 | Gift Set with 9 Products, Toiletry Bag | Lotion, Shave, Wash, Soap, Pomade, Lip Balm | Simple & Effective Review Date: 2020/02/08 Store: MARLOWE. M BLEND Average Rating: 4.3 Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '10.24 x 5.24 x 4.76 inches; 2.62 Pounds', 'UPC': '859984007822'} Review Text: I am a fan of MARLOW products...I have several others not included in this set and all are great. I'll break down each product briefly below.

BAG: Very nice, basic black but well padded and holds it's shape. I basic in shape but I higher quality then usual.

SOAP: Great balsam/fir scent. Excellent balance of exfoliation and suds. Leaves body invigorated, soft and smelling great!

SHAVE: Has a tea scent, hint of some sort of alcohol. Builds into a creamy texture, not much sud but decent coverage. Does it's job. Finishes with a clean scent.

FACE WASH: Nice balsam/fir scent to it. A little goes a long way! Very slick, seems to not penetrate but wash the exterior of skin. Takes some work to wash off. Finishes with a green tea scent and refreshed.

FACE MOISTURIZER: Has a tea/alcohol scent at first...Goes on smooth. Dries fairly quickly, leaving a sweet green tea scent. Leaves face feeling soft not oily.

POMADE: Great scent, more cologne like. Goes on easy, not too tacky or slick. Does a decent job.

LIP BALM: Awesome balm!!! At first I thought it was an odd addition to the set. But man I love this balm. Goes on with a hint of sweet tea. Not waxy, not glossy, just a perfect balance that keeps lips moisturized. Review Title: Great set...All you need in one bundle. Great gift for someone. Rating: 5.0 --------------------------------------------------

profile:
**User Preferences Summary:**

- **Brand Affinity**: Strong preference for MARLOWE products, indicating brand loyalty and satisfaction with their quality and effectiveness.
- **Product Types**: Enjoys comprehensive grooming kits, valuing convenience and all-in-one solutions that include skincare, shaving, and grooming items.
- **Scent Preferences**: Favors natural, fresh scents such as balsam/fir and green tea, which are described as invigorating and pleasant.
- **Quality Expectations**: Seeks high-quality products, as evidenced by the appreciation for well-designed packaging and effective formulations.
- **Experience Orientation**: Values practical benefits of products, such as exfoliation in soap and moisturizing properties in lotions and balms, signaling a focus on functionality.
- **Gift-Giving**: Considers grooming kits a suitable gift option, reflecting a belief in their universal appeal for personal care.

Overall, this user shows a clear trend towards preferring effective, quality grooming solutions with pleasing scents, highlighting both personal use and gifting considerations.
